name: Octoclutz
description:
Description:

It's the world of tomorrow, the year 2022. You are a genetically modified cephalopod created by the mad scientists at Octolab industries. You have one purpose: to help everyone at the lab... at. any. cost.

Complete tasks in this short puzzle-solving physics simulator.

A Prototype made in 2 weeks.

Controls: 

WASD to move Left click on an object to pick it up. Left click again to throw it. Right click to drop a held object. Space bar to drop from any surface to the ground. Tab to open your objectives (press this a lot)

We'd love your feedback!

What do you like or hate about it?
On a scale of 0-10, how much would you like to play a fuller, more polished version of this game? 
Let us know in the comments below or with the in game feedback system! :D
